NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Laboratory, optical and precision equipments (excl. glasses)

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B02

SHORT_DESCR.P: High-resolution UHPLC-MS/MS-instrumentation based on quadrupole and TOF analyzers.
The equipment shall consist of the following parts listing also minimum requirements:

1) UHPLC pump system — min 1000 bar — DAD-/PDA detector — temperature-controlled autosampler (min range 5 – 40 C) — temperature-controlled column oven (min range 5 – 60 C) - Need to be able to pump non-polar solvents like hexane - max. total delay volume of 100 (binary pump) and 160 ul (quaternary pump);

2) Q-TOF instrument — ESI and APCI ionization options — Minimum mass accuracy of minimum 0.8 ppm (internal) and 2 ppm (external) — Dynamic range of more or equal to 4 orders of magnitude — Isotopic pattern representation of the ions. The average intensity deviation of each single isotope should be less than 2 % — MS resolution must be equal to or better than 40 000 FWHM at m/z 1000 at acquisition speeds of at least 45 Hz (MS) and 30 Hz (MS/MS);

4) software package — Client/server-based processing software solutions - Suitable for both qualitative and quantitative data processing — Software algorithms to identify the molecular formula of metabolites based on accurate mass and isotopic information for both the metabolites and their fragments — Screening and quantitation possible within single run — Indicators and scoring based on annotation quality for identified compounds in targeted analysis — Availability and software support for both libraries and databases — Software for discovery and exploration of new compounds and statistical comparisons;
a) Ions belonging to the same compound combined into one feature, i.e. isotopes, charge states, adducts or fragments;

b) Compound identification via databases/libraries and/or web search for possible structures based on elemental compositions automatically generated — Export options of results to enable data evaluation in 3rd party tools, e.g. for advanced statistics, pathway mapping or network analysis — Free instrument and application support by phone and email — In case the control computer and/or processing computer is based on Windows 7 platform, all the softwares to be freely upgraded to Windows 10 versions when support for 7 not anymore available;

5) Service, consumables, warranty — minimum of 1 year warranty — Training of minimum of 3 days provided — Consumables/spare parts available minimum of 7 years — Consumables to be delivered within max. 5 working days — Service response from the first contact within 2 working days.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: A tenderer may also provide a list of options such as: Nitrogen generator (air-to-gas-type, feed from existing air-line), processing computer/server, programmable autosampler, advanced training, A/D converter (in order to attach additional detectors; 16 bit or better), additional detectors, column exchanger, and other options supporting or adding up to the usability of the instrumentation. The use of options are at sole discretion of the Buyer. Options are not to be used in price comparison.

INFO_ADD.P: Though variants are not accepted a tenderer may offer different devicecombinations. Each devicecombinations must fulfill the minimum requirements specified in the invitation to tender and its appendices. Each offer is considered as an independent and separate offer and evaluated as an independent and separate offer.

Instructions for obtaining test samples: In order to participate into test a tenderer should send its request for test samples by email to Doc., PhD Jukka-Pekka Suomela, jusuom@utu.fi as subject “Test sample request University of Turku, High-resolution UHPLC-MS/MS-instrumentation 151839”. Requests are asked to be send as soon as possible but latest on 15.3.2018 at 2:00 pm (UTC +2). Once a tenderer provides Suomela the address he shall send the samples with further information. A tenderer shall return test results electronically together with the official tender.
